title: Water Walking Boots
summaries: Water Walking Boots are an accessory that allows a player to walk on water, honey and shimmer. The player moves across both liquids at normal speed without sinking. They are found in Water Chests, though they are much rarer compared to other Water Chest items. They do not allow walking on lava (although the upgraded Lava Waders will do so). When the player is on a liquid, they may press down to fall through the liquid, similar to a platform. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, there is a 10*1/10 (10%) chance to find Water Walking Boots in Ocean and Seaside Crates.

statistics.Tooltip: Provides the ability to walk on water & honey
statistics.Sell: 4
